content: At the end of the fight, a cutscene will begin and Erlang and the Destined One will return to their previous forms. You'll hear a barrage of voices while the wind spins around you, and you'll be transported out of Mount Mei.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_3_Secret-Mount_Mei_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 3 Secret - Mount Mei Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Mei-Jian Peak' and the sub-subsection 'Erlang Shen'.
The content is as follows:
At the end of the fight, a cutscene will begin and Erlang and the Destined One will return to their previous forms. You'll hear a barrage of voices while the wind spins around you, and you'll be transported out of Mount Mei.
